title: Group portrait of four women wearing corsages, including woman standing in center wearing eyeglasses, light colored short sleeved dress with bow at neckline and circular pattern on sleeves, light colored beaded earrings and necklace, holding document inscribed "The Victory Charity Club Certificate Award Mrs. Catherine Simonson ...the woman of the year", standing in interior in front of grand piano with floral arrangement, streamer hanging from ceiling
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
